Key Match Events: South Africa posted 399 on the board and waltzed to victory by 229 runs
Heinrich Klaasen was named Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: Aiden Markram, South Africa captain: 'Slightly surprised with Englandâ€™s decision at the toss. We know they like chasing, we'd have batted first. Happy it worked out the way it did.'
Jos Buttler, England captain: 'Incredibly disappointing. Come in with hopes of playing well but we were short of that and were well beaten.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Marco Jansen was named Cricinfo's MVP with 163.72 points
Others: The match was played at Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai, India
